sources.title: Animal Cracker Circus (1938)
sources.description: A toddler refuses to eat his spinach and had fed some of it to the dog before the cracker ringmaster promises a show if he finishes it. He does and the show starts. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/animal-cracker-circus-1938/

metadata.Plot: Sparky hates spinach and doesn't want to finish his lunch, which contains spinach. Suddenly a cracker comes to life and makes a deal with him--if Sparky finishes his spinach, he'll be able to see a live circus.
metadata.Actors: Leone Le Doux, Danny Webb, Paula Winslowe
